flawed_nl_solution:
The profit Ronald wants is $3000 / 3 = $<<3000/3=1000>>1000
The profit per phone sold will be $1000 / 200 phones = $<<1000/200=5>>5/phone
The cost of each phone is $3000 / 200 phones = $<<3000/200=15>>15/phone
The selling price including the profit will be $15/phone + $5/phone = $<<15+5=24>>24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20.0, not 24.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
